name: Memantine and Donepezil Hydrochlorides Extended-release

indications.text: memantine donepezil hydrochlorides extended-release capsules indicated treatment moderate severe dementia alzheimer ’ type patients stabilized 10 mg donepezil hydrochloride daily .

contraindications.text: patients donepezil hydrochloride 10 mg , recommended starting dose memantine donepezil hydrochlorides extended-release capsules 7 mg/10 mg , taken daily evening . dose increased 7 mg increments recommended maintenance dose 28 mg/10 mg. minimum recommended interval dose increases one week . ( 2.1 ) patients memantine hydrochloride ( 10 mg twice daily 28 mg extended-release daily ) donepezil hydrochloride 10 mg daily switched memantine donepezil hydrochlorides extended-release capsules 28 mg/10 mg , taken daily evening . ( 2.1 ) memantine donepezil hydrochlorides extended-release capsules taken without food , whole sprinkled applesauce ; divide , chew , crush . ( 2.2 ) severe renal impairment : recommended maintenance dose memantine donepezil hydrochlorides extended-release capsules 14 mg/10 mg daily evening . ( 2.3 )

adverseReactions: memantine donepezil hydrochlorides extended-release capsules contraindicated patients known hypersensitivity memantine hydrochloride , donepezil hydrochloride , piperidine derivatives , excipients used formulation .
indications_original: Memantine and donepezil hydrochlorides extended-release capsules are indicated for the treatment of moderate to severe dementia of the Alzheimer’s type in patients stabilized on 10 mg of donepezil hydrochloride once daily.
contraindications_original: For patients on donepezil hydrochloride 10 mg only, the recommended starting dose of memantine and donepezil hydrochlorides extended-release capsules is 7 mg/10 mg, taken once daily in the evening. The dose should be increased in 7 mg increments to the recommended maintenance dose of 28 mg/10 mg. The minimum recommended interval between dose increases is one week. (2.1) Patients on memantine hydrochloride (10 mg twice daily or 28 mg extended-release once daily) and donepezil hydrochloride 10 mg once daily can be switched to memantine and donepezil hydrochlorides extended-release capsules 28 mg/10 mg, taken once daily in the evening. (2.1) Memantine and donepezil hydrochlorides extended-release capsules can be taken with or without food, whole or sprinkled on applesauce; do not divide, chew, or crush. (2.2) Severe renal impairment: the recommended maintenance dose for memantine and donepezil hydrochlorides extended-release capsules is 14 mg/10 mg once daily in the evening. (2.3)
adverseReactions_original: Memantine and donepezil hydrochlorides extended-release capsules are contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to memantine hydrochloride, donepezil hydrochloride, piperidine derivatives, or to any excipients used in the formulation.
